audioText: Il faut être prudent avec ce type lâche qui pourrait nous embrasser puis nous trahir logiquement.
question: What warning is given about this person?
options: We must be careful with this cowardly type who could embrace us then betray us
We should trust this person completely with our secrets
This person is very brave and will always help us
This person is too shy to make any decisions
explanation: The text states 'Il faut être prudent avec ce type lâche qui pourrait nous embrasser puis nous trahir logiquement' - We must be careful with this cowardly type who could embrace us then logically betray us. 'Lâche' means cowardly/coward, and includes missing lemmas 'embrasser' (embrace) and 'logiquement' (logically).
